metaData.label: DIAB&VR
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Endocrinology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Diabetology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Endocrinology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Infectious Diseases OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Epidemiology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Hygiene OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Virology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal HIV/AIDS Medicine

metaData.label: ONCO
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Chemotherapy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology Radiotherapy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatric Oncologist

metaData.label: SURG
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal General Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Colorectal Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urological Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gynaecological Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Rheumatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Traumatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Orthopaedic Surgery
